messages.title: ELECTION COMMUNICATION
messages.content: Christiane Sayers is determined to ensure that she will work for the common good.

messages.title: #STAND UP FOR WHAT MATTERS
messages.content: Let's return more Green members of Parliament.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: An economy that works for all

issues.brexitEurope: Real opposition to the Government's extreme Brexit.
issues.economy: To shape an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment.
issues.education: To build affordable homes and provide properly funded public services.
issues.governance: To put power back in your hands through a citizen’s democracy.

leaflet.personalStatement: Christiane Sayers is an active campaigner for the NHS, education and the environment, and against austerity. She also campaigned against the Iraq war. She ran in the local elections in 2016 and sees this General Election as a real opportunity to offer an alternate vision in what is a crucial time in local, national and international politics.

politicalExperience.role: Teacher in a local secondary school
politicalExperience.achievements: Understands the importance of giving the next generation the best possible future through renewable living, quality education and a say in the country's international future.

images.caption: Image of the candidate, Christiane Sayers.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This publication has not been paid for by big business or corporate interests, but has been supported and funded by ordinary people. Promoted by Ian Grover on behalf of Green Sayers of 43 The Ryde, Hatfield, AL9 5DP.
